title: Geiers Gambrinus
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Beer/Wine, Catering, European, German, Austrian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Uses regional and seasonal ingredients. Has a cafe area. There is a separate vegan menu with a soups, starters, main courses, and desserts - ask for it. At lunch during the week til 2:30pm one of the 2 meals is vegan and comes with soup.
